io.smudgr.extensions.midi

Class MidiExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.extensions.midi.MidiExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerExtension, Device.DeviceObserver

    public class MidiExtension
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerExtension, Device.DeviceObserver
    The MidiExtension provides functionality for binding Controllable items to an arbitrary MIDI controller input.

      • bindDevice

        public void bindDevice(java.lang.String deviceName,
                       boolean startServer)
        Binds to a given device and optionally starts a DeviceServer to broadcast messages from the given device across the network.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - Fully-qualified device name that the system currently has the device registered to.
        startServer - optionally start a DeviceServer

      • waitForBind

        public void waitForBind(int control_id,
                        boolean absolute,
                        int ignoreKey)
        Waits and listens for the user to trigger an input, and binds that input to the given Controllable id
        Parameters:
        control_id - Project.getId(ProjectItem)
        absolute - true if the input should be an absolute value, such as a slider, or relative, such as a continuous knob
        ignoreKey - optional key to ignore accidental user input from
